WITH RECURSIVE CommentHierarchy AS ( SELECT comment_id, post_id, author_id, parent_comment_id, content, created_at, updated_at, 1 AS level, CAST(comment_id AS TEXT) AS path FROM comments WHERE parent_comment_id IS NULL AND post_id = #{postId} UNION ALL
SELECT c.comment_id, c.post_id, c.author_id, c.parent_comment_id, c.content, c.created_at, c.updated_at, ch.level + 1 AS level, CAST(ch.path || '.' || c.comment_id AS TEXT) AS path FROM comments c JOIN CommentHierarchy ch ON c.parent_comment_id = ch.comment_id ) SELECT comment_id as CommentId, post_id as postId, author_id as authorId, parent_comment_id as parentCommentId, content, level, path, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM CommentHierarchy ORDER BY createdAt DESC;
